messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Report

Thanks to the tireless efforts of our security and intelligence divisions, there are currently no credible threats to Space Station 13. All station construction projects have been authorized. Have a secure shift!

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: We are recruiting new Security Officers, come to the HoP's office for an opporitunity to do something better with your life!

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: We need a virologist stat I've caught the big gay

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to Space Station 13. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Starboard Quarter Solar Maintenance.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

High levels of radiation detected near the station. Maintenance is best shielded from radiation.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

The radiation threat has passed. Please return to your workplaces.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Alright you ADD bastards, I'll call the shuttle in 10 or so minutes. Let's hope nothing inconviently tragic happens in that time

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Localized hyper-energetic flux wave detected on long range scanners. Expected location: AI Satellite Hallway.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Alright you fucking goldfishes, I'll tell Centcomm that we've all turned into monkeys and that the Space Bubonic Plague has been released

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Chemistry.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Message

Incoming subspace communication. Secure channel opened at all communication consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Unidentified armed ship detected near the station.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: ATTENTION CREW! THIS IS THE HEAD OF SECURITY, GARETH J! SIDDALL! I MAY HAVE ANGERED SOME PARTICULAR!!! UHH!!! BAD FELLOWS! BUT WE SHALL MAKE IT THROUGH THIS! DO NOT FEAR! SPACE LAW SHALL PREVAIL! REMEMBER, I WAS A LAWYER! I'LL SUE THESE BASTARDS FOR DAMAGE!!!
